verses.name: Proverbs 16:17
verses.text: The highway of the upright is to depart from evil: he that keepeth his way preserveth his soul.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:18
verses.text: Pride goeth before destruction, and an haughty spirit before a fall.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:19
verses.text: Better it is to be of an humble spirit with the lowly, than to divide the spoil with the proud.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:20
verses.text: He that handleth a matter wisely shall find good: and whoso trusteth in the Lord, happy is he.

verses.name: Proverbs 16:21
verses.text: The wise in heart shall be called prudent: and the sweetness of the lips increaseth learning.
